text: Maurice Goldberg (1881–1949) was a Russian-born painter and photographer who emigrated to the United States and became a noted portrait photographer. A collection of his work is in the Margaret Herrick Library of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. == References == == External links == * Category:1881 births Category:1949 deaths Category:Russian emigrants to the United States Category:Russian painters Category:Russian photographers
title: Maurice Goldberg
